title: I can't play the new game modes
body: So I've kept trying to play the new game modes. I can usually play them once and then the option disappears. I know it didn't get patched out but I'm really not sure why I cannot play. Help!

replies.body: The new rotating game modes queue is only available for a limited time!  The modes are usually activated sometime early Friday evening and shut down sometime Monday Morning/Afternoon (different per region).  This would explain why you may not see it currently when you open the client!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BHdgjquN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-10T00:18:33.192+0000)
>
> The new rotating game modes queue is only available for a limited time!  The modes are usually activated sometime early Friday evening and shut down sometime Monday Morning/Afternoon (different per region).  This would explain why you may not see it currently when you open the client!

That sounds like a bug. They should be available all of the time. ;)
